title: Chicken cacciatore with pancetta
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 whole chicken, cut into pieces', '6 slices pancetta, diced', '2 onions, chopped', '60g (2 oz) fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '225ml (8 fl oz) white wine', '450g (1 lb) tomatoes, diced']
